name: An Inconvenient Clicker
description:
Click to dispose trash

In this clicker, instead of clicking to make a number go up, you need to click to make a number go down. Click to Burn trash, or click Recycle it. Then click to Hire burners and recyclers to click those buttons for you. But these contractors will need to be paid, so click on time to Pay them before they quit, or hire foremen on a salary to click the Pay Contractor button for you... and so on.

Solve Earth's trash problem before it gets too hot

Unlock additional technologies as you dispose more trash in order to get ahead of human's increasing wastefulness. Get trash to zero before the planet overheats!

Background

I made this game several years ago as a side project, but I've now decided to publish it here. If there's enough interest I will add more randomized events like I had planned to back then, but otherwise I present the game as-is.
